by pentamania

from enchant.js

by Serra

by 魔王魂(Maoudamashi)

*IMAGES==============================
Field tile graphics, image fontset
from enchant.js
URL: http://enchantjs.com/

Window image tilemap, emotion balloon, title background image
from ぴぽや素材(Pipoya)
URL: http://piposozai.wiki.fc2.com/

Other images (character images, target images, logos, etc.) 
by pentamania
